titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to simplify certain requirements regarding withholding and reporting at the source and to correct inequities regarding carryover of losses.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 1/6/1987--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to repeal the withholding tax requirements with respect to gambling winnings. Requires information returns for gambling winnings only for payments of $10,000 or more. Provides a three-year carryover and carryback for net gambling losses.
